title: Flipped Learning & Team-Based Learning Preparation Session: Advanced Mathematics Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in mathematics domain, no flipped/team-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Online real-time education for in-service practitioners conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of flipped learning and the necessity of pre-learning
Learners can propose three or more effective collaboration strategies in team-based learning environments
Learners can establish and share learning objectives using online real-time lecture tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
